hs.name: hideandseek
hs.desc: View the rules of the minigame Hide and Seek
hs.hs_rules:
**RULES:**
Alpha or smaller team = hiders
Beta or larger team = seekers

<:hs1:373194237837312000> 1min for uneven teams (or 45sec for large stages like Moray Towers)
<:hs1:373194237837312000> 45sec for even teams (or 30sec for large stages like Moray Towers)
<:hs1:373194237837312000> No subs/specials
<:hs1:373194237837312000> No map (by extension no super jump)
<:hs1:373194237837312000> Hiders win if time is up without all of them having died
<:hs1:373194237837312000> Seekers win if all hiders die
<:hs1:373194237837312000> Hiding time deaths are excluded
<:hs1:373194237837312000> Any seeker that dies may continue
<:hs1:373194237837312000> Any hider that dies is out and may only return as a spectator
